ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss]
ygData.msgSnippet: My understanding is that HTML5 references Web Forms 2.0 for form submission, and WF2.0 already has support for PUT and DELETE:

My understanding is that HTML5 references Web Forms 2.0 for form 
submission, and WF2.0 already has support for PUT and DELETE: 
http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-forms/current-work/#for-http

Pete

> I have posted to the html5 WG mail list asking for PUT and DELETE to be
> included as acceptable <form> method values, to avoid needing to use
> XmlHttpRequest from browser UAs (and for more graceful functional
> degradation in the face of disabled JavaScript).
